    • Point

      public Point​(double x, double y, double z, int[] prevEnd)
      Define a new point in 3D with an associated array
      Parameters:
      x - position in the x-axis
      y - position in the y-axis
      z - position in the z-axis
      prevEnd - the array of location of the last nonnull Point in an array of point
